channel.title: Laser Cutting on Paul Cairns
channel.description: Recent content in Laser Cutting on Paul Cairns

item.title: Laser Cutting
item.description: The assignment for this week was to learn the basics of computer controlled cutting using a vinyl cutter and a laser cutter. The assignments for this week were: Group assignment characterize your lasercutter’s focus, power, speed, rate, kerf, and joint clearance document your work (individually or in group) Individual assignments Design, lasercut, and document a parametric press-fit construction kit, which can be assembled in multiple ways. Account for the lasercutter kerf.
